statements: UPDATE regulatory_compliance_data SET product_name = 'Product A', regulatory_category = 'Category A' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE regulatory_compliance_data SET consumer_communication = 'This is a sample consumer communication message.', marketing_practice = 'Approved' WHERE product_name = 'Product B';

UPDATE consumer_communications SET communication_content='New product launch announcement', company_name='XYZ Corp' WHERE id=3;

UPDATE consumer_communications SET communication_content = 'Updated Communication Content', communication_type = 'Email' WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Ltd' AND id = 456;
